job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtSift Media is looking for a proven software developer with excellent data science skillsampnbsp Our bidder makes buying decisions on over 50 billion ad requests per dayampnbsp Our data science helps us bid on the right users at the right timeampnbsp Targeting is crucial but the methods implemented must be performant enough to execute in realtimeampnbsp If you enjoy cuttingedge technology massive amounts of data and being part of the small team powering one of the fastestgrowing companies in North Carolina youll probably find this interestingltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtQUALIFICATIONSltpgtltulgtltligtBS or MS in Computer Science Mathematics or equivalent work experienceltligtltligtPractical Data Science experienceltligtltligtExperience with machine learning frameworks such as Amazon MLltligtltligtSoftware development experience preferably with a JVM based language Java Scala ClojureltligtltligtSolid experience with query languagesltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
